newsitem.title: USA: U.S. HEADLINE STOCKS - Issues to watch - Oct 24.
newsitem.headline: U.S. HEADLINE STOCKS - Issues to watch - Oct 24.

text.p: * Procter & Gamble Co is expected to report first quarter earnings per share of $1.37, compared to $1.27 a year ago, according to First Call. The stock closed at 96-1/4.
* BMC Software Inc rose one point to 85 in after-hours trading Wednesday. BMC reported second quarter net per share of $0.66, compared to $0.50 a year earlier.
* Browning-Ferris Industries Inc reported fourth quarter operating earnings per share of $0.33, compared to $0.48 a year ago. The First Call estimate was $0.34. The stock closed at 26-1/2.
* American International Group Inc is expected to report third quarter earnings per share of $1.50, compared to $1.30 a year ago, according to First Call. The stock closed at 105-5/8.
* Chubb Corp is expected to report third quarter earnings per share of $0.98, compared to $0.89 a year ago, according to First Call. The stock closed at 49.
* Dow Chemical Co reported third quarter earnings per share of $1.92, compared to $2.15 a year ago. The First Call estimate was $1.89. The stock closed at 78.
